original_title: Immunoglobulin scandal: Ex-Deputy Director of Health Services remanded
original_body_lines: The former Deputy Director of Health Services, Herath Kumara has been remanded until January 10.
He was produced before the Maligakanda Magistrate Lochana Abeywickrama earlier today (Jan.05).
Kumara was arrested by the officers of Criminal Investigation Department (CID) over the substandard human immunoglobulin scandal.
